title: ImportError: libiomp5.so: cannot open shared object file
body_html:
Hi

My environment is Linux 2.6.32 gcc 4.8.2 cuda 8.0 python 2.7. Install pytorch by pip install
https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/cu80/torch-0.1.10.post1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

The installation is successful However I got the error by import torch like below.

ImportError: libiomp5.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory.

libiomp5.so should be a part of Intel compiler?

Best Regards,

body:
Hi

My environment is Linux 2.6.32 gcc 4.8.2 cuda 8.0 python 2.7. Install pytorch by pip install
https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/cu80/torch-0.1.10.post1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl 

The installation is successful However I got the error by import torch like below.

ImportError: libiomp5.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory.

libiomp5.so should be a part of Intel compiler?

Best Regards,
